TopicTitle: Maneuver nodes not working in science mode

Articles.Content: Trying to fly to Mimmus, everthing has working normal up till this point. In orbit around Kerbin using nodes as per normal. Now i can not set one or remove used one! Have reset saved and. This worked briefly and then failed again. Don't want to give up on Ksp as i played for years on pc.....but this is a bit unplayable!!!
Save and completly shut down the game at the home screen. Reload and it should work. Had this issue before and it fixed it.
